scenes.name: the sphinx riddle
scenes.description:
You come across a great beast - THE SPHINX, a creature with the head of a woman, the haunches of a lion, and the wings of a bird. 

"LISTEN, TRAVELER - IF YOU CAN SOLVE MY RIDDLE, YOU MAY PASS. OTHERWISE, YOU SHALL PERISH.
WHAT GOES ON FOUR LEGS IN THE MORNING, 
TWO LEGS IN THE AFTERNOON,
AND THREE LEGS IN THE EVENING?" 

 - give up

scenes.name: man
scenes.description:
"WELL DONE, TRAVELER. YOU MAY PASS." 
 - continue

scenes.name: death
scenes.description:
THE SPHINX devours you. This is the end. 
 - quit
